posts.post_content:
A very attractive Griffith T3.  Extra bold colors, super clean and clear.  Nice sharp corners.  Held back in grade by a thin vertical crease, bottom center.  Clean 1-75 checklist back.  Very clean card.

I am asking $425 shipped and insured.

Thanks,
Craig

Many more nice Turkey Reds available at [url]www.t3turkeyred.com[/url]
